alert.note: Alert for Amite; Pike (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 3:56PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern St. Helena and northwestern Tangipahoa Parishes, southwestern Pike and southeastern Amite Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 356 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gillsburg, or 9 miles southeast of Liberty, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Magnolia, Kentwood, Osyka and Gillsburg. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 61 and 66. Interstate 55 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
